channel.title: Bill Gates on Sometimes we write something:)
channel.description: Recent content in Bill Gates on Sometimes we write something:)

item.title: Fascinating interview with Steve Jobs and Bill Gates
item.description: <img src="/media/Steve_Jobs_and_Bill_Gates.jpg" /> In 2007, All Things Digital held a fascinating interview with both Bill Gates and Steve Jobs. The interview runs long and is spread out over multiple clips. I’ve only included the first handful here. Watch the rest on youtube. It’s clear that they have a reasonably good relationship and clearly know each other well. They have a genuine and sincere respect for each other. It’s amazing how firm a grasp both have on the industry as a whole.
